alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Chowan; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 18 at 2:34AM EST until December 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Bertie, Chowan and Perquimans Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Shallow flooding is expected in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline resulting in a low threat of property damage. Expect up to one foot of water above ground level in low lying, vulnerable areas. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks and lawns near the waterfront will experience shallow flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
